item.title: How many Cases of Covid-19 in Arizona?
How many Cases of Covid-19 in California?
item.description: The data is scraped from the California Health Department website which can lead to some surprising numbers. Here is the source for the current numbers, and here’s a historical listing of all the data.

item.title: How many Cases of Covid-19 in Oregon?
item.description: Oregon data is sometimes zero because our health department is slow updating their website. Want even more data? Go expand the tables with the little + symbols at the Oregon Health Authority.
